City Planning
=============

[Home](https://www.horizoncity.org/)City Planning

City Planning
-------------

The City Planning Department administers Planning, Development and Zoning for Horizon City.

**LAND DEVELOPMENT & BOARD/COMMISSION APPROVAL APPLICATIONS:**

* [Affidavit- Representative Appointed for Various Applications](http://www.horizoncity.org/wp-content/uploads/AFFIDAVIT-Combo-Application-1.pdf)
* [Combination Subdivision Plat Application](https://www.horizoncity.org/wp-content/uploads/Application-Subdivision-COMBO-PRELIMINARY-and-FINAL-Plat-Approval-13FEB2020.pdf)
* [Subdivision Preliminary Plat Approval](http://www.horizoncity.org/wp-content/uploads/Application-Subdivision-Plat-PRELIMINARY-Approval-13FEB2020-1.pdf)
* [Subdivision Final Plat Approval](http://www.horizoncity.org/wp-content/uploads/Application-Subdivision-FINAL-Plat-Approval-13FEB2020-1.pdf)
* [Subdivision Replat Approval](http://www.horizoncity.org/wp-content/uploads/Subdivision-REPLAT-Application-13FEB2020-1.pdf)
* [Subdivision Construction Plans Review Application](http://www.horizoncity.org/wp-content/uploads/Application-Subdivision-Construction-Plans-Review-13FEB2020-1.pdf)
* [Recording Plat Approval Application](http://www.horizoncity.org/wp-content/uploads/Recording-Plat-Application-13FEB2020-1.pdf)
* [Mylar Certification Form](http://www.horizoncity.org/wp-content/uploads/Mylar-Certification.pdf)
* [Rezone Application](http://www.horizoncity.org/wp-content/uploads/REZONE-Application-030119-1.pdf)
* [Specific Use Permit Application](http://www.horizoncity.org/wp-content/uploads/SPECIFIC-Use-Permit-Application-21Feb.2023-1.pdf)
* [Vacation of Public Easements and ROW](http://www.horizoncity.org/wp-content/uploads/Vacation-of-Public-Easement-ROW-1.pdf)
* [Land Development Exemption Determination w/ Affidavit Application](http://www.horizoncity.org/wp-content/uploads/Land-Development-Exemption-Determination-App-1.pdf)
* [Zoning Verification Application](https://www.horizoncity.org/wp-content/uploads/HC-Zoning-Verification-Application-1.pdf)
* [Legal Non-Confirming Application](https://www.horizoncity.org/wp-content/uploads/Legal-Non-Conforming-Application-2.pdf)

**VARIANCE APPLICATIONS:**

* [Sign Variance Application](http://www.horizoncity.org/wp-content/uploads/Sign-Variance-Application-080317-1.pdf)
* [Variance Application](http://www.horizoncity.org/wp-content/uploads/BoA-Variance-Application-080317-1.pdf)
